name: MaterialParameterTypes.TextureCoordinateTransform
desc: An object that defines a transformation the framework applies to a material’s UV-mapped textures.

items.name: init(offset: SIMD2<Float>, scale: SIMD2<Float>, rotation: Float)
items.desc: Creates a texture coordinate transform object.

items.name: var offset: SIMD2<Float>
items.desc: The amount by which the framework offsets the entity’s UV texture coordinates.

items.name: var scale: SIMD2<Float>
items.desc: The amount by which the framework scale the UV texture coordinates.

items.name: var rotation: Float
items.desc: The amount by which the framework rotates the UV texture coordinates you specify in radians.
